title: Expand your mind with 12min, which makes learning fun and accessible for only $50
content:
Macworld

Looking to use tech to expand your mind? 12min makes it fun and easy to grow your personal knowledge through microbooks, and for a limited time, lifetime access is only $49.99.

Boasting a community of over 6 million inquisitive truth seekers, the 12min library features a vast collection of over 2,500 non-fiction microbooks, each condensed into a tidy 12-minute summary. The library itself is vast, covering 24 different and varied categories like finance, parenting, leadership, sales, productivity, and more.

The editorial team at 12min creates both text and audio versions of these summaries, making them easily accessible online and downloadable for offline use. Meanwhile, the quick 12-minute format is ideal for anyone with only a spare minute in their day, and users can choose to learn from the microbooks via text or audio format.

Browse popular titles like The 7 Habits of Highly Effective People, Rich Dad Poor Dad, The 4-Hour Workweek, and 30 Ways to Reboot Your Body. And with the addition of approximately 30 new books each month, users have access to a continually expanding collection. Users can also recommend books for inclusion if they aren’t already in the library.

Grow your mind with lifetime access to the 12min Premium Plan, now just $49.99.
